summary: Veer-Zaara is a saga of love, separation, courage and sacrifice. A love story that is an inspiration and will remain a legend forever.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Preity Zinta|Rani Mukerji|Kirron Kher|Divya Dutta|Boman Irani|Anupam Kher|Amitabh Bachchan|Hema Malini|Manoj Bajpayee|Zohra Sehgal|S.M. title: Veer-Zaara
